attributes.action: Remove 'Priminster's Question Time' from the Houses of Parliament timetable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Priminster's Question Time is letting down the democratic system of Great Britain by bringing it into direpute.


The rediculousness of the event is now beyond belief. Many people, I am sure, looked for a new phases in this event; Mr Brown, however, has disappointed.
